nodes.text: The Lesser Evil was a short narrative by Peter M. Schweighofer published in the Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook.

Darth Vader orders a bombardment of Falleen to contain a plague that has been unleashed on the planet by a failed biological experiment released after a lab accident. On the Star Destroyer Devastator, Vader makes the decision after speaking with Captain Bolvan.
